name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Turtles in Time Re-Shelled
name_original: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Turtles in Time Re-Shelled
description: While sitting around the sewer watching television, Leonardo, Raphael, Michelangelo, Donatello, and Master Splinter witness a giant android ripping the Statue of Liberty from the ground, terrifying hundreds of tourists. Use pizza power-ups and huge body slams to make your way backwards and forwards through history in an attempt to restore peace to the Big Apple.
